data.description: Detailed examination of the acoustic properties of the speech signal within the source-filter theory of speech production. Theories of speech perception pertaining to phoneme and word recognition are presented and discussed.
data.title: SPEECH ACOUSTICS AND PERCEPTION

data.description: Anatomy and physiology of the speech production mechanism; acoustic characteristics of the speech signal.
data.title: ANATOMY AND PHYSIOLOGY OF SPEECH PRODUCTION

data.description: Physical acoustics of sound, the anatomy and physiology of the auditory system, and the psychology related to hearing, known as psychoacoustics.
data.title: HEARING SCIENCE
